Class StoryBoard

Namespace
AlohaKit.Animations
Assembly
AlohaKit.Animations.dll

Represents a storyboard that orchestrates a sequence of animations on a target element.

[ContentProperty("Animations")]
public class StoryBoard : AnimationBase, INotifyPropertyChanged
